com.rivelbop.rivelworks.utils

Class GamePad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.utils.GamePad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener

    public class GamePad
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener
    Used as a simplified wrapper around the GDX Controller library.
    Author:
    David Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.Controller controller
      The default GDX controller, used as the backbone for a GamePad.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean> JUST_PRESSED_MAPPINGS
      Keeps track of all buttons that have just been pressed to provide functionality for isButtonJustPressed(int).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GamePad()
      Grabs the current/recently used controller and sets its listener to the default within the class.

      Creates a GamePad with the provided controller and sets its listener to the default within the class.
      GamePad(GamePad gamePad)
      Creates a GamePad with the provided GamePad and sets its listener to the default within the class.
      GamePad(int index)
      Grabs the controller with the provided index and sets its listener to the default within the class.

      • isButtonJustPressed

        public boolean isButtonJustPressed(int button)
        Checks to see if the provided button index is just pressed (only true once when held down).
        Parameters:
        button - The index of the button that is just pressed.
        Returns:
        If the button is just pressed.

      • mapping

        public com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerMapping mapping()

        Returns:
        The controller button/joystick mapping.

        Vibrates the controller for the provided time and strength.
        Parameters:

        strength - The strength of the vibration (0f-1f).
